Marial Art Gallery #2

Marial art gallery promotes contemporary art from Kenya. Our intention is to create a strong and sustainable art market for kenyan artists by supporting and promoting the most innovative and exciting artists currently practicing in the region. Through solo exhibitions , the gallery has increased visibility for established and emerging artists .
